batch_narrative: azure_status: new 'Ongoing Service Degradation in West US r'.

new.headline: Ongoing Service Degradation in West US region - Partial Recovery Observed

content.excerpt_text: Starting at 08:00 UTC, we became aware of a power outage affecting one of the datacenters in the West US region, resulting in service disruption across multiple Azure services for a subset of customers.Our engineering teams are actively investigating the underlying issue and working to mitigate the impact.As of 10:45 UTC, we have started to observe partial recovery in the region.We continue to monitor regional service health closely and will share more updates as soon as they become available.

source_payload.html: Starting at 08:00 UTC, we became aware of a power outage affecting one of the datacenters in the West US region, resulting in service disruption across multiple Azure services for a subset of customers.Our engineering teams are actively investigating the underlying issue and working to mitigate the impact.As of 10:45 UTC, we have started to observe partial recovery in the region.We continue to monitor regional service health closely and will share more updates as soon as they become available.
